Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Jar with an oval-shaped body, a medium-sized neck and a simple lip. Coloured dark grey, it bears a complex decorative pattern made with impressions on the neck and the upper section of the body. The motifs are mostly geometrical but also include, near the neck, two very schematic representations of giraffes, facing opposite directions.
